MysqlDatabase

Manage a MySQL database connection.  This class implements all of the current DBD interface as defined in Database.

Limitations

MysqlDatabase currently does not retrieve column types.

See Also

BaseDatabase, Database

Summary
MysqlDatabase
Manage a MySQL database connection.
Functions
connect
Connect to a database on a MySQL server

Functions

connect

Connect to a database on a MySQL server

Keywords

hosthostname
dbnamedatabase name

Example

MysqlDatabase db = new MysqlDatabase();
db.connect("host=localhost;dbname=test", "username", "password");
Database interface that all DBD’s must inherit from
Manage a MySQL database connection.
Base Database implementation that is suggested that other DBD’s inherit from.
